points.title: Information is provided about how they collect personal data
points.status:
Collection of Information

We receive and store information about you such as:
- Information you provide to us
- Information we collect automatically
- Information from companies that integrate Fast.com
- Information from other sources

points.title: Your IP address is collected, which can be used to view your approximate location
There is a date of the last update of the agreements
points.status: The date of the last update is at the bottom of the privacy statement.

points.title: The terms may be changed at any time, but you will receive notification of the changes
points.status: We will update this Privacy Statement from time to time in response to changing legal, regulatory or operational requirements. We will provide notice of any such changes (including when they will take effect) in accordance with law.

points.title: This service informs you that its Terms of Service does not apply to third party websites
points.status: The Fast.com service may be provided through and/or utilize features (such as voice controls) operated by third party platforms, or contain links to sites operated by third parties whose policies regarding the handling of information may differ from ours. For example, you may be able to access the Fast.com service through platforms such as gaming systems, smart TVs, mobile devices, set top boxes and a number of other internet connected devices. These websites and platforms have separate and independent privacy or data policies, privacy statements, notices and terms of use, which we recommend you read carefully. In addition, you may encounter third party applications that interact with the Fast.com service.

points.title: Minors must have the authorization of their legal guardians to use the service
points.status: Individuals under the age of 18 may utilize the service only with the involvement, supervision, and approval of a parent or legal guardian.

points.title: This service may collect, use, and share location data
points.status:
Geolocation data: Our applications don’t collect precise geolocation data from GPS sensors. However, we do collect IP addresses from which we can determine your general location.
   
Geolocation data: We may disclose geolocation data for business purposes with the following categories of third parties: Service Providers, an entity engaged in a business transfer/merger, law enforcement, courts, governments and regulatory agencies.

points.title: The service claims to be CCPA compliant for California users
points.status: This Privacy Notice applies to California consumers and supplements the Privacy Statement.
